Class FEditTable.EditTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FEditTable.EditTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
    Enclosing class:
    FEditTable

    public abstract static class FEditTable.EditTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
    table model that allows the table contents to be edited via the FEditTable
    Author:
    aeb

    • Method Detail

      • setComponentValue

        public void setComponentValue(int row,
                     int col,
                     FComponent c,
                     java.lang.Object value)
        when new or edit are clicked, this method is called with either the empty string (new) or model.getValue (edit). This method must preset the edit component to correctly represent this value
        Parameters:
        row - current row (-1 if new row)
        col - component to set
        value - empty string (new) or model.getValue (edit)

        check the consistency of an edit in its entire form
        Parameters:
        row - the row being edited
        values - the form values
        Throws:
        FEditTable.TableEditException - thrown if the edit cannot be performed
